song.eTitle: Tell Me the Old, Old Story

verses.refrain: Tell me the old, old story, Tell me the old, old story, Tell me the old, old story, Of Jesus and His love;
verses.verse: Tell me the old, old story, Of unseen things above, Of Jesus and His glory, Of Jesus and His love; Tell me the story simply, As to a little child, For I am weak and weary, And helpless and defiled.

Tell me the same old story, When you have cause to fear That this world's empty glory Is costing me too dear; Yes, and when that world's glory Is dawning on my soul Tell me the old, old story: "Christ Jesus makes thee whole."
